title: Kumis Digital
description: Complete digital project creation, including concept development, branding, graphic design, web design, and development. The website was built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and later customized with PHP to create a custom template in WordPress.
role: Project creator, web designer, and developer.

title: About
description: This project was my very first website that I coded entirely on my own. I utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to bring it to life. If you're interested in learning more about me, please feel free to explore. I hope you find it enjoyable!
role: Project creator, web designer, and developer.
